amazons.algorithms.greedy package¶

Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.greedy.greedy_algorithm_mobility module¶

class amazons.algorithms.greedy.greedy_algorithm_mobility.GreedyAlgorithmMobility¶

Bases: Algorithm

Algorithm based on a greedy approach that uses a mobility heuristic function

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

make_move(board, player)¶

Returns the move that the algorithm chooses :param board: state of the board :param player: int that represents the player :return: chosen move

class amazons.algorithms.greedy.greedy_algorithm_territory.GreedyAlgorithmTerritory¶

Algorithm based on a greedy approach that uses a territory heuristic function
